54d45105-f912-45d6-a675-c196b988b2ce.name: 战斗反射
54d45105-f912-45d6-a675-c196b988b2ce.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

4f6e01a5-487f-4d97-b1bd-0c0c2c9f454c.name: 健康
4f6e01a5-487f-4d97-b1bd-0c0c2c9f454c.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

78108286-b4e2-4f67-81de-d662dbc0109d.name: Fit, Very
78108286-b4e2-4f67-81de-d662dbc0109d.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

366ed4c4-727b-485c-9e2a-eb6669fe77b0.name: 高痛阈
366ed4c4-727b-485c-9e2a-eb6669fe77b0.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture
